prereqs: jq (for JSON manipulation, per Nix config)

install_steps.step: No explicit installation of Node.js packages or builds required (schema files and JS script assumed present)

config.name: run = "node validate-schema.js" (.replit)
config.purpose: Specifies the development/launch command for the Replit environment

config.name: [nix] channel = "stable-23_11"
config.purpose: Defines NixOS package channel used for the dev environment in Replit

config.name: [deployment] run = ["sh", "-c", "node validate-schema.js"]
config.purpose: Defines deployment run command for Replit environments

run_dev.step: Validate the ELI schema and example output using the validation script
Replit: Click Run button to validate schema and sample output

run_prod.step: Production execution is not supported; ELI defines only schemas/contracts and validation, not a production service

usage_examples.description: Validate the schema locally via CLI

verification_steps.step: Check that examples/eli-output.sample.json conforms to contracts/eli-output.schema.json
The script emits whether schema validation passes or fails. Observe the output for validation status.

common_failures.cause: Example output file does not match the defined schema
common_failures.fix: Update the example output or schema to be consistent

common_failures.cause: Node.js is not installed or not available in PATH

unknowns.what_is_missing: Exact contents of validate-schema.js (the schema validation logic/script)
unknowns.why_it_matters: Without this, step-by-step debugging or extension of validation is impossible

unknowns.what_is_missing: Whether there are extra environment variables, or optional config files for advanced validation
unknowns.why_it_matters: May affect extensibility or deployment in CI/CD contexts
unknowns.what_evidence_needed: Presence of a .env, config.json, or related source code

missing_evidence_requests: validate-schema.js is not present, so the exact logic of validation and its options are unknown
No evidence of additional configuration (environment variables, advanced settings) beyond what is present in .replit and replit.nix
No documentation on extending or modifying validation behavior

missing: run_dev: no step with both a runnable command and verified evidence
config: no config item with name+purpose+verified evidence
port_behavior: no port evidence with verified snippet_hash

install_steps: no step with both a runnable command and verified evidence
